examples.text: The island is covered in thick, tropical <w>vegetation</w>.
We struggled to walk through the dense <w>vegetation</w> of the jungle.

senses.sense_definition: An abnormal verrucous or fibrinous growth.

examples.text: The doctor identified a small <w>vegetation</w> on the patient's heart valve.
Bacterial infections can sometimes cause a <w>vegetation</w> to form in the body.

senses.sense_definition: The act or process of vegetating, or growing as a plant does; vegetable growth.

examples.text: The rapid <w>vegetation</w> of the fields in spring is a beautiful sight.
Proper soil moisture is essential for the healthy <w>vegetation</w> of these seeds.
